strings.string: {avatar:id=major_normalSpeak}Ay yo whats up fam im the major, r8 my mustache
{avatar:id=technician_normalSpeak}Nice mustache, fam. I'm the space ship technician.
{avatar:id=sexyNurse_normalSpeak}Hey there big boy, I really like your glasses
{avatar:id=player_glassesSpeak}Thank you baybeee I enjoy your tasteful cleavage.
{avatar:id=player_glassesSpeak}It really brings a lot of attention to your {color:hex=#FF00FF}...eyes
{avatar:id=sexyNurse_normalSpeak}{color:hex=#FF00FF}Thank you so much for saying that about my eyes. I'd love to see your eyes too!{endcolor}
{avatar:id=player_normalSpeak}No problem, ma'am. Here is what my eyes look like.
{avatar:id=sexyNurse_normalSpeak}Well, hot dog! Those really are some eyes!
{avatar:id=player_normalSpeak}They sure are, now watch how fast i can put my glasses back on...

{avatar:id=badFace}Hey guys, I'm the shitty placeholder face Jordan made in MS Paint. Sorry to interrupt i just wanted to compliment that guys speed at putting on glasses, Also i'm testing a longer dialogue bit.
{avatar:id=None}This concludes the conversation about the guys glasses
{avatar:id=None}This is also testing dialogue without an avatar
